arts.ttl: Cardiff City vs Bradford City: EFL League One Preview, Gameweek 9, 2025
arts.sum: Yousef Salech scored a 97th-minute equaliser against Stockport County last weekend to keep Cardiff's unbeaten start intact. He could prove to be a huge threat for Cardiff and maybe he could be the first player to score against the bluebirds from open play in the league this campaign.

arts.ttl: Leigh starts: Bradford City team news and predicted XI to face Cardiff City
arts.sum: The latest Bradford City team news and predicted XI as Graham Alexander's side gear up to face Cardiff City in League One. The post Leigh starts: Bradford City team news and predicted XI to face Cardiff City appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
